H0.text: Analytical balance is the instrument used to make very sensitive mass measurements in a laboratory, usually in grams.

H1.text: Speedometer is the instrument used to make very sensitive mass measurements in a laboratory, usually in grams.

H2.text: Thermometer is the instrument used to make very sensitive mass measurements in a laboratory, usually in grams.

H3.text: Scale is the instrument used to make very sensitive mass measurements in a laboratory, usually in grams.

A4.text: Electronic analytical balances are one of the commonly used instruments in chemical laboratories.
